metadata.title: Temples of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

properties.name: Nauvoo Temple
properties.snippet: Destroyed by arson fire in 1848; rebuilt in 2002

properties.name: Endowment House
properties.snippet: Temporary structure used during the construction of the Salt Lake Temple; razed in 1889

properties.name: Kirtland Temple
properties.snippet: Historic Church building that ceased operation as a temple in the late 1830s
